dct_title_s: Part 2: Map of the Grand Trunk Road from Calcutta to the Sutledge, in three parts : exhibiting the staging bungalows, encamping grounds, dak and overseers' choukies, post office, thannahs and tuhseeldaries
dct_description_sm: Includes chart of Staging bungalows from Benares to Agra.; On transfer paper by G.H. Stapleton, E.C. Politt, & Munneerodden and lith. by H.M. Smith, at the Surveyor General's Office, Calcutta, June 1858.; Relief shown by hachures.; This map is chiefly compiled from the lithographed district maps published in the Surveyor General's Office ...
57 x 234 Centimeters, folded to 32 x 20 Centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_creator_sm: North-Western Provinces (India). Superintendent, Grand Trunk Road
dct_publisher_sm: Office of the Supt. Grand Trunk Road (Allahabad)
